io.micronaut.views.model

Interface ViewModelProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SecurityViewModelProcessor

    public interface ViewModelProcessor
    Implementers of ViewModelProcessor process the ModelAndView and modify it prior to rendering by either adding or removing entries.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
